mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of the city of Richmond, Va / Lith by F. Geese Richd
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Geese, F.
Sheriff & Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Lithographed by F. Geese and Published by Sheriff & Co. for the Richmond, Va. City directory 1875-76
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 27 x 46 cm. on sheet 38 x 48 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: With advertisements for C.C. Walter & Co., dealer in watches, for Robert Harrold, dealer in house furnishings, and for the St. James Hotel at top of sheet.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Detached copy. Long fold separation along Madison Street. William and Elizabeth Morris Fund, 2008/2009.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Richmond (Va.)--Maps.
